about_the_game:
Step into the world of Hope's Farm 2, where farming meets puzzle-solving! Help Hope and Noah transform a simple farmland into a thriving paradise.

Grow crops, raise charming animals, and decorate your farm to reflect your style.

Sell farm goods through engaging puzzles and earn experience points to unlock exciting new items! With unique quests, adorable animals, and endless customization options, this relaxing yet challenging journey will keep you coming back for more.

Do you have what it takes to make Hope’s dream farm a reality?

Features:

  • A Unique Blend of Gameplay: Combine farm simulation with challenging match-3 puzzles;

  • Raise Adorable Animals: Welcome cows, alpacas, chickens, and pigs;

  • Grow and Harvest Crops: Cultivate strawberries, pumpkins, sunflowers, and more!

  • Personalize Your Farm: Use Edit Mode to design your farmland and make it uniquely yours;

  • A Charming Storyline: Follow Hope's  journey as she build the farm of her dreams;
